T01TD1169E:241a-1: ta th'a ga ta n'a ma sang+g'i ti k'a lpi ka bha dra aa lam ka ra m'a la n'a ma /
T01TD1169E:241a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T01TD1169E:241a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad lags pa'i gtsug gis phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241a-5: mdzes snang bskal par rnam par brgyan zhing du //
T01TD1169E:241a-6: 'khor los sgyur rgyal yul 'khor srung sras stong //
T01TD1169E:241a-7: sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rin po che //
T01TD1169E:241a-8: sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal pos bskal bzang 'dir //
T01TD1169E:241a-9: rgyal 'gyur lung bstan sangs rgyas stong dag dang //
T01TD1169E:241a-10: rdzus skyes mched gnyis la yang phyag 'tshal nas //
T01TD1169E:241a-11: rgyal kun yul rigs 'od dang yab yum sras //
T01TD1169E:241b-0: rim @241b gro shes rab can mchog rdzu 'phrul can //
T01TD1169E:241b-1: 'dus tshad tshe tshed bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad //
T01TD1169E:241b-2: sku gdung mchod rten tshul dang sems bskyed tshul //
T01TD1169E:241b-3: re re'ang bco lnga bco lngas rgyas gsungs mod //
T01TD1169E:241b-4: 'dir ni gus pas mtshan tsam brjod par bya //
T01TD1169E:241b-5: bde gshegs 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang ;
T01TD1169E:241b-6: /'od srungs sh'akya'i skyes mchog byams pa dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-7: seng ge rab gsal thub pa me tog dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-8: me tog gnyis pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-9: rgyu skar bzang dang ded dpon lag chen dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-10: stobs chen rgyu skar rgyal po rtsi sman dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-11: snyan pa dang ni tog dang 'od chen dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-12: grol ba'i phung po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-13: rnam par snang mdzad nyi ma'i snying po dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-14: zla ba 'od 'phro 'od bzang mya ngan med //
T01TD1169E:241b-15: skar rgyal dang ni rab gsal phreng thogs dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-16: yon tan 'od la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-17: don gzigs dang ni mar me mthu ldan dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-18: sman pa dang ni nges pa mdzod spu dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-19: brtan ldan lha yi dpal dang gdul dka' dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-20: yon tan rgyal mtshan rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-21: sgra gcan mchog ldan tshangs dbyangs tshig brtan dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-22: mi 'gying 'od mdzad lhun po chen po dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-23: rdo rje dang ni sdom can mi bsnyengs pa //
T01TD1169E:241b-24: rin chen rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-25: pad spyan stobs sde me tog 'od zer dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-26: ye shes dgyes dang gzi chen tshangs pa dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-27: 'od dpag med dang klu sbyin brtan par gshegs //
T01TD1169E:241b-28: don yod mthong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-29: brtson 'grus sbyin dang bzang skyong dga' bo dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-30: 'chi med seng ge rgyal mtshan rgyal ba chos //
T01TD1169E:241b-31: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po kha lo sgyur //
T01TD1169E:241b-32: dgyes par gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-33: chu lha dang ni yon tan yan lag dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-34: spos kyi glang po rnam gzigs 'brug sgra dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-35: legs sems yid bzang dri med zla ba dang //
T01TD1169E:241b-36: grags chen rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-37: gtsug na nor bu drag shul seng ge'i stabs //
T01TD1169E:241b-38: ljon pa rnam rgyal can dang shes rab brtsegs //
T01TD1169E:241b-39: legs gnas dang ni blo gros yan lag skyes //
T01TD1169E:241b-40: blo mtha' yas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:241b-41: gzugs bzang dang ni mkhyen ldan 'od zer dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-0: brtul zhugs brtan dang bkra shis bden pa'i @242a * //
T01TD1169E:242a-1: tog / pad+ma sred med bu dang lag bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-2: ye shes 'byung gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-3: yon tan 'od 'phro tshangs byin rin 'byung gnas //
T01TD1169E:242a-4: lha yi me tog dang ni don legs sems //
T01TD1169E:242a-5: chos kyi dbang phyug blo gros spobs pa brtsegs //
T01TD1169E:242a-6: rdo rje rgyal mtshan phan bzhed phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-7: rnam par rol ldan mun bral sgra gcan lha //
T01TD1169E:242a-8: ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs 'od rin chen snying //
T01TD1169E:242a-9: shin tu mthor gshegs skar rgyal ru rings dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-10: yon tan grags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-11: nyi zla nyi 'od skar mkhan seng ge'i tog / dus mkhyen rgyal po dpal snying srid mtha' gzigs //
T01TD1169E:242a-12: glog 'od gser gyi ri bo seng ges byin //
T01TD1169E:242a-13: gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-14: mchog dga' grags pa brtson 'grus brtan grags rdzogs //
T01TD1169E:242a-15: bsnyengs bral mchod 'os lha dang sgron chen dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-16: 'jig rten 'od dang spos dri zhim po dang ;
T01TD1169E:242a-17: / yon tan mchog 'dzin mun bral phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-18: seng ge'i 'gram dang rin chen grags skyon zhi //
T01TD1169E:242a-19: bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi'i zla shin tu gzigs //
T01TD1169E:242a-20: rab brgyan nor 'od ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog / chos 'byung don nges ldan la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-21: chos byin rin chen 'byung gnas skye dbang mtshungs //
T01TD1169E:242a-22: stobs kyis gshegs dang blo gnas gdugs mdzes dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-23: gtso bo shin tu 'phags pa dpal seng sgra //
T01TD1169E:242a-24: rnam par rol ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-25: klu 'od me tog ri dang klu dga' dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-26: spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags stobs lha //
T01TD1169E:242a-27: yon tan 'phreng ldan klu'i lag mig rgyan dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-28: legs par sbyangs pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-29: zil gnon mtha' yas spyan dang bden pa gsung //
T01TD1169E:242a-30: nyi ma'i 'od dang nges blo mtha' yas gzugs //
T01TD1169E:242a-31: rnam snang rin chen tog dang the tshom spangs //
T01TD1169E:242a-32: 'jig rten 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo /
T01TD1169E:242a-33: don yod rnam par gnon dang rtogs mdzad dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-34: me tog rgyal mtshan ri dbang rgyal gzi chen //
T01TD1169E:242a-35: don mdzad gzigs dang grags yas rin chen lha //
T01TD1169E:242a-36: don mkhyen blo rdzogs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242a-37: mya ngan med dang dri bral tshangs lha dang //
T01TD1169E:242a-38: sa dbang me tog spyan dang rnam 'byes sku //
T01TD1169E:242b-0: chos 'od @242b kun gzigs yon tan 'od gsal dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-1: dri med zla ba'i zhal la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-2: rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni //
T01TD1169E:242b-3: grags pa'i bla ma 'od byed gzi dpag med //
T01TD1169E:242b-4: dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku dang mkhas blo dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-5: rgyal dka' yon tan phung po phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-6: zla ba'i tog dang mthu ni thob pa dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-7: thu rtsal mtha' yas zla ba dri med dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-8: don rnams thams cad gzigs dang dpa' bo dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-9: 'byor ldan bsod nams sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-10: yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-11: legs skyes nor lha yid gnyis spong ba dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-12: 'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred choms med dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-13: mi gnas pa dang der gnas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-14: phyogs chen gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-15: phal chen rgyal dang gzi brjid mtha' yas dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-16: don blo sman pa'i rgyal po tha ba spangs //
T01TD1169E:242b-17: rims nad med dang legs byin phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-18: grags byin me tog byin dang skyes bus byin //
T01TD1169E:242b-19: rdo rje'i sde dang phal chen byin pa dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-20: zhi ba'i blo gros spos glang sred med bu //
T01TD1169E:242b-21: des pa dang ni mi tshugs phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-22: nyi zla glog gi tog dang mchod pa dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-23: dpal sbas dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-24: don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-25: pad+ma dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-26: ye shes 'gros dang nyon mongs bral ba dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-27: 'dam bu dang ni spos bzang yul 'khor rangs //
T01TD1169E:242b-28: lha grags srid mtha' gzigs dang zla ba dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-29: sgra gcan rin chen zla la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-30: seng ge rgyal mtshan dang ni bsam gtan dgyes //
T01TD1169E:242b-31: rdzogs ldan rnam rol yon tan rin chen dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-32: dgra bcom grags pa pad ngos mdzod spu ldan //
T01TD1169E:242b-33: spobs grags rdo rje nor bu phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-34: tshe dpag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang //
T01TD1169E:242b-35: dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags //
T01TD1169E:242b-36: 'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros //
T01TD1169E:242b-37: yid 'thad rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-38: zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo sgyur //
T01TD1169E:242b-39: dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug na rin po che //
T01TD1169E:242b-40: bsnyengs bral rin chen snying po zla ba'i zhal //
T01TD1169E:242b-41: dri ma med grags zhi brjid phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:242b-42: dga' tog sgra gcan lha dang na tshod bzang //
T01TD1169E:242b-43: lha dga' rin chen phung po mdzes par gshegs //
T01TD1169E:242b-44: seng ge'i phyogs pa shin tu mthor gshegs dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-0: skye dbang blo gros bzang po phyag @243a * //
T01TD1169E:243a-2: 'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-3: skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod //
T01TD1169E:243a-4: stegs mdzad dang ni spos glang blo 'od 'phro //
T01TD1169E:243a-5: ri bo'i rgyal mtshan spos bzang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-6: chos brtan dang ni gzi brjid drag shul can //
T01TD1169E:243a-7: chos kyi nor bu bzang byin bde gshegs zla //
T01TD1169E:243a-8: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang seng ge zla ba dpal //
T01TD1169E:243a-9: legs skyes thub med tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-10: grags pa bshes gnyen dang ni bden pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-11: dka' thub chen po lhun po'i 'od zer dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-12: yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-13: sbyin 'od glog 'byin bden gsung phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-14: 'tsho byed na tshod bzang po legs tshogs can //
T01TD1169E:243a-15: rnam nges blo gros srid mtha' nor bu'i spos //
T01TD1169E:243a-16: rgyal dgyes seng ge'i 'od zer rnam snang mdzad //
T01TD1169E:243a-17: grags mchog thugs rab gzhungs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-18: nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer dang ;
T01TD1169E:243a-19: / brtul zhugs thub med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs //
T01TD1169E:243a-20: 'jig rten bla ma glang seng zla ba dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-21: rin 'od sgra gcan sbed la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-22: yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-23: rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-24: mya ngan med pa shugs bcu stobs dgyes dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-25: mthu dpal mthu thob mthu chen phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-26: yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-27: dge mchog rgyal po skar rgyal 'od zer che //
T01TD1169E:243a-28: glog 'od yon tan rgya chen rin po che //
T01TD1169E:243a-29: dpal 'od dang ni bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-30: go bgos seng ge'i phyag dang me tog bzang //
T01TD1169E:243a-31: rin chen mthon po dang ni rgya mtsho dag / sa 'dzin don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags //
T01TD1169E:243a-32: yon tan tshogs dang rin me phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-33: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten zla ba dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-34: dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs can gtso //
T01TD1169E:243a-35: seng ge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-36: chos dbang gzi 'od 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-37: rin chen grags pa tshogs gsal grags mtha' yas //
T01TD1169E:243a-38: 'od zer don yod lha yi drang srong dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-39: skye dbang dge 'dun brtan dang phyogs bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:243a-40: tog dang yul 'khor me tog phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243a-41: chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs //
T01TD1169E:243b-0: legs bsam @243b grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-1: yon tan bsrungs don blo gros bsnyengs pa med //
T01TD1169E:243b-2: grogs brtan 'od gnas mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-3: nor zhabs thar pa'i gzi brjid ngos bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-4: blo bzang kun du gzi brjid ye shes mchog / tshangs par gnas dang bden pa gsung ba dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-5: blo bzang dang ni stobs byin phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-6: seng stabs me tog tog dang shes 'byung gnas //
T01TD1169E:243b-7: me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-8: rin chen grags pa grags pa rmad byung dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-9: mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi 'od phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-10: tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal ye shes dgyes //
T01TD1169E:243b-11: lta bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan grags //
T01TD1169E:243b-12: ye shes dpal dang bcings med brtul zhugs brtan //
T01TD1169E:243b-13: lha yi gzi brjid rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-14: tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul zhugs dka' thub dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-15: 'od zer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che //
T01TD1169E:243b-16: tsam pa ka dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang //
T01TD1169E:243b-17: dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dgyes chen phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-18: sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can 'od //
T01TD1169E:243b-19: skrun mdzad mdangs 'gro don legs nges pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-20: khyu mchog dang ni lag bzang 'od zer che //
T01TD1169E:243b-21: bsam byin bsod nams 'od la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-22: rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde dang ni //
T01TD1169E:243b-23: 'byor ldan seng ge'i stobs dang dri med spyan //
T01TD1169E:243b-24: 'od srungs dang ni blo gsal ye shes 'gros //
T01TD1169E:243b-25: gzi brjid drag shul 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-26: nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od //
T01TD1169E:243b-27: gzi brjid rnam 'byes khangs med sbrang rtsi'i zhal //
T01TD1169E:243b-28: zla 'od glog 'byin rang zhir gshegs pa dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-29: mi 'khrugs dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-30: chos kyi yon tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po //
T01TD1169E:243b-31: mngon par 'phags dang sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-32: pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang //
T01TD1169E:243b-33: rin chen mchog dang thugs gzhungs phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-34: rgya mtshos byin dang tshangs tog zla ba'i gdugs //
T01TD1169E:243b-35: 'od 'phro dri med rgyal po ye shes grags //
T01TD1169E:243b-36: kun rgyal yon tan 'od dang sgra grags dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-37: zla rgyas rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:243b-38: pad+ma'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang //
T01TD1169E:243b-39: sgron rgyal glog gi 'od dang 'od zer rgyal //
T01TD1169E:243b-40: skar mkhan grags rdzogs pad+ma'i snying po dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-0: rgyal dang spyan mdos rnams la phyag @244a * //
T01TD1169E:244a-2: rnyog pa med don dang ni drag shul sde //
T01TD1169E:244a-3: bsod nams gzi brjid mthu rtsal thogs med blo //
T01TD1169E:244a-4: sgra gcan lha dang shes phung kha lo sgyur //
T01TD1169E:244a-5: skye mtshungs me tog tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-6: sgra gcan 'dzin dang sman chen rgyu skar rgyal //
T01TD1169E:244a-7: sman rgyal bsod nams glang po gcod mdzad dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-8: rnam grags rgyal po nyi ma'i 'od zer dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-9: chos mdzod blo gros bzang po phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-10: yon tan dbang mtshungs dang ni rdo rje'i sde //
T01TD1169E:244a-11: shes rab brtsegs pa legs gnas blo sbyangs dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-12: tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-13: mngon shes tog dang tog 'od phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-14: dge ba tshangs ba skyes mchog spyan sdug pa //
T01TD1169E:244a-15: klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-16: zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang rin chen 'od //
T01TD1169E:244a-17: dbyangs byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-18: seng ge dang ni 'od zer sna tshogs dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-19: ye shes dpa' bo pad phur me tog rgyas ;
T01TD1169E:244a-20: / mthu stobs bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-21: skar mkhan zla ba sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-22: gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-23: mi zad mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas //
T01TD1169E:244a-24: yul 'khor shes rab mchog ma gzi chim [?] mdzad //
T01TD1169E:244a-25: shes byin mgon po 'jam dbyangs phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-26: chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang gtso bos byin //
T01TD1169E:244a-27: gtso bo ye shes mthu rtsal 'od 'phro can //
T01TD1169E:244a-28: dbang po dang ni shugs 'chang skar rgyal dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-29: 'od bzang grags pa byin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-30: gzugs bzang dang ni rgyal po don grub dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-31: seng ge'i sde zhes bya dang nor lha'i bu //
T01TD1169E:244a-32: grags pa rgyal ba rgya chen snying po dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-33: bsod nams 'od zer smrang 'don phyag 'tshal lo /
T01TD1169E:244a-34: sgron ma'i rgyal po dang ni ye shes brtsegs //
T01TD1169E:244a-35: lha mchog sa bdag gol brnyes gtsug gi gser //
T01TD1169E:244a-36: sgra gcan bzang po thub dka' thub gsal dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-37: zla ba'i 'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-38: gser 'od legs byin lha yi yon tan dbang //
T01TD1169E:244a-39: chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags med dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-40: ye shes gya nom blo gros zhib mo dang //
T01TD1169E:244a-41: gzi byin thams cad rtsi sman phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244a-42: rnam grol tog dang 'od mdzod ye shes rgyal //
T01TD1169E:244a-43: 'jigs mdzad chu bo spangs dang thogs med grags //
T01TD1169E:244b-0: bden pa'i @244b phung po dbyangs snyan ri dbang mtshungs //
T01TD1169E:244b-1: chos brtsegs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-2: thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad rab zhi'i sku //
T01TD1169E:244b-3: yid 'ong gsung dang blo sbyangs chu yi lha //
T01TD1169E:244b-4: 'gros mchod seng logs chos kyi mthu rtsal dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-5: skal bzang rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-6: mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-7: rtogs mdzad spyan legs don la gnas pa'i blo //
T01TD1169E:244b-8: snang ba'i 'od zer spos gzi kun dga' mdzad //
T01TD1169E:244b-9: don yod gshegs dang khro bcom phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-10: gzugs mchog legs gshegs rab sbyin grags pa dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-13: mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdas nyid gzi mdangs dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-14: rgyal rigs skal ldan shing rta phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-15: gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-16: spos gnas dregs pa spongs dang ye shes mdzod //
T01TD1169E:244b-17: tshangs par gshegs dang tsandan mya ngan med //
T01TD1169E:244b-18: seng ge'i 'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-19: yul 'khor tog dang pad snying gzi mtha' yas //
T01TD1169E:244b-20: lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-21: ye shes 'byor ldan dang ni tshangs pa'i dbyig / phyag na rin chen dbang ldan phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-22: rdzogs par gsung dang mchog gsung mchod 'os dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-23: skar rgyal nyi ma dang ni 'dam las brgal //
T01TD1169E:244b-24: ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rma bya dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-25: chos byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-26: phan par bzheng dang ye shes ldan grags pa //
T01TD1169E:244b-27: 'od zer dra ba dang ni rnam par bcom //
T01TD1169E:244b-28: beed'urya snying me tog lha rgyal po //
T01TD1169E:244b-29: zla ba dang ni dran 'od phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-30: dge 'od yon tan mchog 'od rin chen dpal //
T01TD1169E:244b-31: skyes bu zla ba sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i 'od //
T01TD1169E:244b-32: 'jig rten mchog dang skar 'od zhi ba'i stabs //
T01TD1169E:244b-33: ye shes rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-34: ri dbang rab zhi yon tan mtha' stobs dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-35: lha dbang dang ni dbyangs snyan ngos bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-36: don gnas yon brjid mkhyen ldan zla med dang //
T01TD1169E:244b-37: nga ro dpag med rgyal ba phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:244b-38: 'od bzang thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral //
T01TD1169E:244b-39: dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog mdzes gshegs //
T01TD1169E:244b-40: zhi don skyon med blo sbyangs dge ba dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-0: pad mdzod 'od zer bzang po phyag @245a * //
T01TD1169E:245a-2: spobs pa'i mdog dang stegs bzang tshogs dbang dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-3: bsnyengs bral ye shes bzhed pa spobs pa'i spyan //
T01TD1169E:245a-4: blo mchog zla ba rin chen zla 'od dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-5: bsnyengs med rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-6: gzigs pa che dang tshangs dbyangs bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-7: shes rab che stegs blo gros zla med dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-8: rdo mkhregs byang chub blo gros ljon shing dbang //
T01TD1169E:245a-9: gdangs snyan bsod nams stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-10: mthu dpal 'phags la dgyes dang mthu stobs dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-11: skar ma dgyes dang sprin sgra spyan sdug zhal //
T01TD1169E:245a-12: ye shes bzang ldan 'byor ldan yon tan phung //
T01TD1169E:245a-13: gsal ba rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-14: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-15: nam mkha' mchod sbyin nga ro shes 'god dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-16: yon 'od gzi brjid drang srong dbang blo ldan //
T01TD1169E:245a-17: spobs tshogs mchod sbyin bzang po phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-18: zla zhal shin tu gzigs dang rdul bral dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-19: yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod rgyal mtshan //
T01TD1169E:245a-20: yul 'khor spobs pa rin chen rab sbyin dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-21: zla dgyes seng ge'i stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-22: dbang sgyur rgyal po bdud rtsi gsal ba dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-23: bsam gtan snyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma zhi //
T01TD1169E:245a-24: phyogs ma bslad dang mdzes pa zhal bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-25: shugs gnas ye ldan gsung dbang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-26: gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab bdud rtsi //
T01TD1169E:245a-27: chos kyi stobs dang mchod ldan me tog 'od //
T01TD1169E:245a-28: khams gsum mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying //
T01TD1169E:245a-29: lhas mchod thar pa'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-30: dge gtsug bdud rtsi'i 'od dang rdo rje dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-31: brtan pa rin chen phung po mdzes gshegs dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-32: nyi ltar gshegs dang dag 'od yon tan gtsug / dpal rdzogs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-33: seng ge'i stabs dang gyen 'phags me tog byin //
T01TD1169E:245a-34: 'od 'gyed pad+ma dang ni ye shes dgyes //
T01TD1169E:245a-35: bkod mdzes gti mug med gnas rma med pa //
T01TD1169E:245a-36: tog gi rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245a-37: bde dgongs gti mug med rgyal chog mkhyen //
T01TD1169E:245a-38: dag pa'i rgya mtsho rin chen mnga' mi mnga' //
T01TD1169E:245a-39: dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhum dang //
T01TD1169E:245a-40: srid srid dri ma spangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-0: spyod pa'i stegs @245b dang lha mang snyan bsgrags dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-1: rin stabs phyag pad bsnams dpal dgra las rgyal //
T01TD1169E:245b-2: 'byor grags yul 'khor bzang dang me tog 'od //
T01TD1169E:245b-3: seng ge'i nga ro rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-4: zla ba ltar shar 'joms pa'i mchog mi g-yo //
T01TD1169E:245b-5: phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal //
T01TD1169E:245b-6: dbyangs bskul go'u ta ma mdangs kyi stobs //
T01TD1169E:245b-7: blo gnas rang bzhin zla bzang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-8: byang chub yan lag me tog bkra shis dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-9: legs ston ye shes gzi stobs dge ba'i sgron //
T01TD1169E:245b-10: mthu rtsal brtan po lha dgra rab zhi dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-11: nyi zhal thar pa'i brtul zhugs phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-12: tshul khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas rdul med //
T01TD1169E:245b-13: snying po 'phags dang mig sman 'phel bar mdzad //
T01TD1169E:245b-14: spos 'od dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang //
T01TD1169E:245b-15: thogs med rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-16: byang chub mchog bgrod spyod gsal rin chen dgyes //
T01TD1169E:245b-17: chos dbang lha thams cad pa bshes gnyen che //
T01TD1169E:245b-18: bshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i stabs //
T01TD1169E:245b-19: bdud rtsi bdag po lhun 'od phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-20: 'phags pas bstod dang snang ldan gzi brjid 'bar //
T01TD1169E:245b-21: snang ba gzigs dang legs spyad rnam par smin //
T01TD1169E:245b-22: legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od //
T01TD1169E:245b-23: spyod ldan bsod nams stobs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-24: yon tan rgya mtsho rmad byung nga rgyal spong //
T01TD1169E:245b-25: bdud brlag mdzad dang bag chags rgal ba'i stabs //
T01TD1169E:245b-26: mi phyed blo mnga' rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-27: tshogs can grol rgyal dga' 'od phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-28: byang rgyal ye shes rin chen shin tu bsil //
T01TD1169E:245b-29: tshangs rgyal ye shes dgyes dang rdzu 'phrul tog / skye dbang mtshungs dang sa yi dbang phyug dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-30: nyi dgyes sgra gcan zla ba phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-31: me tog 'od dang sman bdag mdangs mnga' dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-32: bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs dbyangs snyan dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-33: chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzang dang ;
T01TD1169E:245b-34: /'khrul pa med pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:245b-35: dbyangs chen snyan par grags dang tog ldan dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-36: gzi brjid rnam grags 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-37: ljon pa gti mug rab zad dpag med dang //
T01TD1169E:245b-38: zla bzang spobs yas tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-0: brtul zhugs bstar dang mchod gnas @246a * //
T01TD1169E:246a-2: dge dges 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs //
T01TD1169E:246a-3: zhabs mdzes autpala dul gnas me tog dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-4: spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-5: drang srong gsal ba yon tan brtson 'grus snying //
T01TD1169E:246a-6: lta bdag rin chen mthon po gsal ba dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-7: skal ldan shing rta bsod nams blo gros dag / sbyin sreg 'od 'phrog zi phung phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-8: seng ge'i stabs dang mi g-yo rab gsal dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-9: 'od spyod glu dbyangs glu dbyangs 'khor lo 'dzin //
T01TD1169E:246a-10: dbyig mchog 'jig rten dga' dang chos zla dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-11: dga' ba mtha' yas grags la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-12: sprin tog shes rab 'gros dang spos bzang dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-13: nam mkha'i dbyangs dang lha dang lha rgyal dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-14: nor bu gsal dang nor bzang sgron ma dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-15: rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-16: skye dbang rgyal po sgra gcan sbed pa dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-17: dge mdzad sar blo rin chen grags pa dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-18: don mdzad mdzad mtha' gzigs dang srid me tog / mdzod spu spobs pa mtshungs med phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-19: ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mche ba //
T01TD1169E:246a-20: mdzes gshegs bsod nams sgron ma bkra shis ldan //
T01TD1169E:246a-21: yul 'khor myang med blo gros sems blo ldan //
T01TD1169E:246a-22: chos sgron shin tu gzigs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-23: shugs 'dor stobs chen shes rab me tog dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-24: brtan pa'i dbyangs dang bde ldan don gsung dang //
T01TD1169E:246a-25: dgyes pa gsal ba seng ge'i zhal gtsug phud //
T01TD1169E:246a-26: snang mdzad rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1169E:246a-27: bskal bzang 'dir 'byung sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan //
T01TD1169E:246a-28: gang gis thos shing gus pas sdig kun sreg /
T01TD1169E:246a-29: rgyal ba kun mthong ngan song sdug bsngal spong //
T01TD1169E:246a-30: bzod ldan bde ba mchog brgyud myang 'das 'thob //
T01TD1169E:246a-31: byang chub sems dpa' mchog dga' rgyal po yi //
T01TD1169E:246a-32: drin gyis legs bsgos kha che pan chen gyis //
T01TD1169E:246a-33: sbyar 'di gzhan las don lngas khyad par 'phags //
T01TD1169E:246a-34: de lta'ang nyes tshul sdig kun so sor bshags //
T01TD1169E:246a-35: bdag gi mos blos 'bad pa cher byas pa'i //
T01TD1169E:246a-36: dge ba 'di dang mtha' yas dge ba kun //
T01TD1169E:246a-37: 'gro ba kun sbyin kun kyang rgyal ba yis //
T01TD1169E:246a-38: kun du rjes bzung kun mkhyen myur thob shog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba //
T01TD1169E:246a-39: kha che'i pandi ta sh'akya shr'is sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T01TD1169E:246b-1: lo tstsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur /
T01TD1169E:246b-3: // / slad kyi char yang sa skya lo ts'a bas cung zad bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
